nodes.text: This Prowler 1000 exploration droid was deployed at a Star Tours transport terminal during the Galactic Civil War to investigate the whereabouts of a Rebel spy. The droid scanned the cabin of a StarSpeeder 1000 through its viewport and identified one of the passengers as the spy, but the vessel took off, pushing the Prowler droid into deep space.
This droid only appears in one of the two randomly chosen opening scenes of Star Tours: The Adventures Continue.

The droid later appeared in a Hasbro Star Tours Action Figure set called "STAR TOURS Search for the Rebel Spy," although it was identified merely as a "seeker droid." It was bundled with an Imperial skytrooper and a signal droid. It also appeared on a T-shirt saying "I am the Rebel spy."
